title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for three items and saving and previewing them, the datetime values displayed differently for the dynamic text item compared to the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format for both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for three items.
2. Save and preview the items.
3. Observe the display of datetime values for the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
